isis.stitle: FAN DRIVE CLUTCH: HORTON ON/OFF - FAN BLADES - MAINTENANCE INSPECTION

svcproc.title: MAINTENANCE INSPECTION
svcproc.para: There is no maintenance of either fan assembly. The fans should be inspected at regular maintenance intervals for cracked fan blades or broken sections on the plastic fan assembly ( Figure 24). On the steel blade fan assembly, check blade to spider retaining rivets for looseness. Also check for loose or broken blades on the spider (hub) ( Figure 25). If any of these conditions are found on either fan blade, replace the fan assembly and discard the old fan assembly.
